title: High Availability Guide
subtitle: Configuring and managing high availability in a Red Hat CloudForms environment

abstract.para: This guide provides instructions on configuring and managing database high availability in Red Hat CloudForms. Information and procedures in this book are relevant to CloudForms Management Engine administrators.

If you have a suggestion for improving this guide or have found an error, please submit a Bugzilla report at http://bugzilla.redhat.com against Red Hat CloudForms Management Engine for the Documentation component. Please provide specific details, such as the section number, guide name, and CloudForms version so we can easily locate the content.
